name: Reset Sleep Routine
func:
global.set('sleep_routine_fired', false);
return msg;

name: Reset Sleep Routine
info:
Daily reset allows sleep routine to fire 
again each night.

Resetting on exterior door unlock means 
the sleep routine will fire again when 
getting back in bed if a door is unlocked
after bedtime.  This should ensure that 
doors are secured while sleeping.

name: Build Notification
Sneaky Child Messages

func:
var o = msg.payload

var sw_info = o.split(";").slice(0,48); 		//8
var edid_info = o.split(";").slice(48,88);  		//5x8 EDID 40EDID
var port_name = o.split(";").slice(88,112);     //3x8 	    24
var source_name = o.split(";").slice(112,120);	//1x8     8
var login_info = o.split(";").slice(120,136);   //8x2   16,510

var input_info = o.split(";").slice(136,144);   //input      
var hdmi_info = o.split(";").slice(144,152);	//HDMI   
var hdbt_info = o.split(";").slice(152,160);

var port_names={
    
    audio: [
        port_name[0].split(":")[1],
        port_name[1].split(":")[1],
        port_name[2].split(":")[1],
        port_name[3].split(":")[1],
        port_name[4].split(":")[1],
        port_name[5].split(":")[1],
        port_name[6].split(":")[1],
        port_name[7].split(":")[1]
    ],
    input: [
        port_name[8].split(":")[1],
        port_name[9].split(":")[1],
        port_name[10].split(":")[1],
        port_name[11].split(":")[1],
        port_name[12].split(":")[1],
        port_name[13].split(":")[1],
        port_name[14].split(":")[1],
        port_name[15].split(":")[1],
    ],
    output: [
        port_name[16].split(":")[1],
        port_name[17].split(":")[1],
        port_name[18].split(":")[1],
        port_name[19].split(":")[1],
        port_name[20].split(":")[1],
        port_name[21].split(":")[1],
        port_name[22].split(":")[1],
        port_name[23].split(":")[1]
    ]
};

return [{sw_info, edid_info, port_names, source_name, input_info, hdmi_info, hdbt_info}];
